comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Shania99>@Shania99</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Shania99>@Shania99</denchmark-link> your environment or dependencies are not correct. You must meet all requirements.txt dependencies. I will link you to working environments below. <denchmark-h:h2>Reproduce Our Environment</denchmark-h>
To access an up-to-date working environment (with all dependencies including CUDA/CUDNN, Python and PyTorch preinstalled), consider a:
GCP Deep Learning VM with $300 free credit offer: GCP Quickstart Guide Google Colab Notebook with 12 hours of free GPU time: Google Colab Notebook Docker Image from https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3. See Docker Quickstart Guide
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
